page.title: 03DUFTON FARMERS WIFE
page.content: I am quite busu as a farmer's wife with 3 small children.This is my week: {Monday}is washday,but with a modern washer,I do a load most days.If the weather's wet,I have a tumble drier. I take my youngest to playgroup in the afternoon,then do the ironing.{Tuesday is bedroom day,4 in all,plus 2 stair- cases a bathroom & the windows.It takes ages to clear the children's floor!{Wednesday}I go to my grand- parents.{Thursday}is downstairs day:5 rooms are a day's work when you do the brass as well.{Friday}is baking day: gingerbread,sponges & biscuits.After dinner I go to Appleby shops.{Saturday no use tidying up as kids are home,but yard gets swept & step washed.We go to the grandparents.{Sunday:}Usually a quiet day apart from tidying up & making dinner,& maybe knitting. { }
